about.title: About
about.subtitle: Who we are

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: At Reviu, we specialize in intelligent management of Google reviews through our platform powered by cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Founded in 2025 by a passionate team of AI and digital marketing experts, our mission is to transform how businesses interact with their customers online.

problem.title: The problem we solve
problem.description1: Customer review management has become crucial for all businesses, but it often represents a considerable workload. Studies show that 93% of consumers read online reviews before making a purchase decision, and 97% consider a company's response to a review influences their perception of it.
problem.description2: Faced with this challenge, many companies find themselves overwhelmed or respond automatically with generic messages that damage their brand image.

solution.title: Our innovative solution
solution.description: Our advanced AI technology deeply analyzes each customer review and generates personalized, relevant, and human responses. Whether thanking a satisfied customer or resolving a delicate situation, our system:

list.item1: Analyzes the sentiment and context of each review
list.item2: Identifies the key points to address
list.item3: Generates a customized response that reflects your company's values
list.item4: Learns and continuously improves through machine learning

benefits.title: Benefits for your business
benefits.description: By using Reviu, you radically transform your online reputation management:

list.item1: Save up to 15 hours per week of manual work
list.item2: Increase your customer satisfaction rate by 37% on average
list.item3: Improve your overall Google rating by 0.8 points on average
list.item4: Transform dissatisfied customers into brand ambassadors
list.item5: Identify trends and gain valuable insights on your strengths and areas for improvement

commitment.title: Our commitment
commitment.description1: We are committed to maintaining the highest standards in data protection and ethics. All your data is processed in accordance with GDPR, and you maintain complete control over how our AI interacts on your behalf.
commitment.description2: Our customer support team is available 7 days a week to assist you and ensure you get the most out of our platform. We are constantly evolving, with regular updates to incorporate the latest advances in AI and respond to changing market needs.

about.conclusion: No learning required: connect your Google Business Profile account, and let our AI do the rest.
about.description: We are a passionate team committed to providing the best services for your business. Our mission is to help you achieve your goals and grow your business.

items.question: How exactly does Reviu work?
items.answer: Reviu uses advanced artificial intelligence to analyze customer reviews on your Google Business listing and generate personalized and relevant responses. After connecting your Google Business Profile account to our platform, our system automatically monitors all new reviews and responds to them for you, 24/7.

items.question: Can I customize the responses generated by the AI?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can define the tone of voice, communication style, and even create response templates for different types of reviews. Our AI will adapt to your preferences while keeping responses natural and personalized for each customer.

items.question: How long does it take to set up Reviu?
items.answer: Setup is extremely quick, typically less than 5 minutes. Simply connect your Google Business Profile account, set a few basic preferences, and the system is ready to go. No technical training or complex integration needed.

items.question: Can I use Reviu for multiple establishments?
items.answer: Yes, our Pro and Enterprise plans allow you to manage multiple establishments from a single dashboard. You can apply different settings for each establishment or create common rules.

items.question: What happens if I'm not satisfied with a response generated by the AI?
items.answer: You have complete control over the responses. You receive a notification for each generated response and can modify or delete them at any time. Our system also learns from your modifications to improve future responses.

items.question: Can Reviu help me manage negative reviews?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our AI is specially designed to handle negative reviews with tact and professionalism. It recognizes the specific concerns of the customer, offers appropriate apologies, and proposes concrete solutions. For particularly sensitive cases, you can configure the system to alert you before publishing the response.

items.question: How does Reviu help me improve my local SEO?
items.answer: Google values businesses that actively respond to their reviews. By using Reviu to systematically and quickly respond to all your reviews, you improve your visibility in local search results. Additionally, our personalized responses encourage customer engagement, which is also a positive factor for your SEO.

items.question: What data can I obtain through Reviu?
items.answer: Our dashboard provides you with detailed analyses of your reviews: satisfaction trends, recurring issues, comparison with your competitors, impact of your responses on overall ratings, and much more. These insights help you identify your business's strengths and areas for improvement.

items.question: How is the pricing calculated for large businesses?
items.answer: For large businesses with multiple establishments, we offer customized plans based on the number of locations, the volume of reviews processed, and the specific features required. Contact our sales team to get a quote tailored to your needs.

items.question: Is there a long-term commitment?
items.answer: No, all our plans are without commitment. You are free to cancel your subscription at any time. We are confident that you will quickly see the added value of our service.
